name: Blazing Horizon
description:
Take to the skies in Blazing Horizon, a 2d aerial combat shooter. Deftly dodge your way though dense Bullet Hell and High speed patterns alike in the games various gameplay modes.


Controls

Keyboard controls are fully rebindable in the options menu.

-left/right:  hold to move left/right

-Thrust - hold to accelerate forwards

-Airbrake - hold to slow acceleration, useful for slowing down if you're about to fly into a bullet

-Rapid Shot: standard rapid shot

-Wide shot: wide shot for killing waves of small enemies. For type 2, holding fires a homing shot instead.

-Heavy shot : A powerful shot for damaging big enemies and pierces smaller enemies

Bomb/Break: Bombs deal damage to enemies and give the player invulnerability for a short period of time. If you have enough energy, you can Break: increasing your damage and movement speed, but also making enemies more dangerous.

Game by Dexter
